title: Why Are So Many Developers Out of Work in 2024?
author: Heather Joslyn
description: Many technologists haven't gained the newer cloud native skills employers need. Learn how the CNCF and Andela are trying to correct that in this episode of Makers.
cntitle: 2024年为什么这么多开发者失业？
cndescription: 许多技术人员尚未掌握雇主所需的较新的云原生技能。在本期 Makers 节目中，了解 CNCF 和 Andela 如何尝试纠正这个问题。
